snippet: The treatment of a teenage drug suspect, caught on video and widely seen, led to four officers' being stripped of their badges and guns five weeks ago.
abstract: The treatment of a teenage drug suspect, caught on video and widely seen, led to four officers' being stripped of their badges and guns five weeks ago.

headline.main: 7 Charges Dismissed Against Man Beaten by Police
headline.print_headline: 7 Charges Dropped for Man Beaten by Police
